text: parantu unamen se jo kisee aisee qaum se ja milen, jinake aur tumhaare beech sandhi ho athava aise log hon, jo tumhaare paas is sthiti mein aayen ki unake dil isase sankuchit ho rahe hon ki tumase yudhd karen athava (tumhaare saath) apanee jaati se yudhd karen. yadi allaah chaahata, to unahen tumapar saamarthy de deta, phir ve tumase yudhd karate. yadi ve tumase vilag rah gaye, tumase yudhd nahin kiya aur tumase sandhi kar lee, to unake virudhd allaah ne tumhaare lie koee (yudhd karane kee) raah nahin banaee[1] hai
